thread.title: Lake Havasu dismisses Bulldogs

title: Lake Havasu dismisses Bulldogs
text: 10/11/2015 5:57:00 AM Lake Havasu dismisses Bulldogs KINGMAN - The Lake Havasu High defense held Kingman to 89 total yards of offense, and the Knights offense put up 36 first-quarter points en route to 63-0 dismantling of the Bulldogs Friday in Lake Havasu City.Havasu (7-0 Division IV, 4-0 Section III) is ranked No. 4 in D-IV and took only 2 minutes, 44 seconds to get its first score.The Knights added 14 points in the second quarter and led 50-0 at the half.Kingman (1-6, 0-4) hosts Kingman Academy (0-7, 0-4) at 7 p.m. this upcoming Friday with the winner moving out of the Section III cellar. • Letter: Regulate the ammunition (686 views) Article Comment Submission Form Comments are not posted immediately.
